reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of PHYS 108, PHYS 118 and one of PHYS 109, PHYS 119; or (b) PHYS 102 or (c) all of PHYS 158, PHYS 159 or (d) SCIE 001.
Co-reqs: One of MATH 200, MATH 217, MATH 226, MATH 253.
WAIT LIST: register on the wait list if the section that only fits your timetable is full, or if you are not eligible for the restricted seats. You will be moved into a lab if space becomes available. DO NOT contact course instructors for registration help. Please contact the Physics and Astronomy Undergraduate Programme Coordinator to discuss your registration in this course.
description: Analog electronics and amplifiers, digital electronics, analog-to-digital converters and an introduction to use of computers in data analysis and simulations.
